note: Some guy, in Florida. Tabletop gaming since 2010. PC gaming since 1997. I watch Twitch too much. I play a fair bit of RimWorld and XCOM 2. I like having short hair and a long beard, and I know my hairline is receding(and I'm ok with aging). I take long walks every day, and I wish my community was more walkable. Its three miles to the closest grocery store on foot, and no public transit comes into the subdivision.
